title: Introduction to Shaktism and Goddess Worship

questions.question: What is Shaktism?
questions.answer: A major tradition within Hinduism

questions.question: What does 'Shakti' literally mean in Sanskrit?

questions.question: In Shaktism, what is the relationship between Shakti and the Supreme Deity?
